title: The Idol Group and the Crown - Novel Updates
tags: Clever Protagonist   Eidetic Memory   Genius Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Modern Day   Music   Showbiz   Singers   Slow Romance   Suicides   Teamwork   Tragic Past
author: 青律
description:
The high school entrance examination's top scorer owed 800,000 yuan in debt and had to sleep in an underground parking lot like a stray dog.

Because of a trainee recruitment plan, his life was completely reversed. From then on, he went away from the darkness, towards an endless light.>
